body:
So as you all know, Podcrash5 and I recently started a build team called R.I. We are making phenomenal progress, and I have a request for all of you. Post ideas of maps (or types of maps) that you would like for us to build for Avicus, and what Minigame you want it to be implemented in to! Examples: Legend of Zelda, Spongebob, Snowy forest, etc... Any ideas you can think of, post it here! Any ideas are greatly appreciated! Thanks guys.

-Jake
body_tagged:

replies.body:
Rule btw:
If a non-team member wants to use the server to build, you are allowed to as long as you are 'helping' a team member the slightest bit or getting 'help' from a team member on your map.

replies.body:
Can we still apply for it? It's fine if we can't, just asking :3
As for a map suggestion, I think you should make a Pokemon-themed map with a Charizard on one side of the map and a Blastoise on the opposite side. It would be in a style of a Pokemon Gym arena (as seen in the anime/games, idk) and the monuments would be in high towers next to the Pokemon builds.

Just pulled that out my head, so it's not really that good :T
